Uses of Class
org.elasticsearch.index.query.MatchQueryBuilder

  • Packages that use MatchQueryBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.elasticsearch.index.query  

    • Uses of MatchQueryBuilder in org.elasticsearch.index.query

      Methods in org.elasticsearch.index.query that return MatchQueryBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MatchQueryBuilder MatchQueryBuilder.analyzer(String analyzer)
      Explicitly set the analyzer to use.
      MatchQueryBuilder MatchQueryBuilder.boost(float boost)
      Set the boost to apply to the query.
      MatchQueryBuilder MatchQueryBuilder.fuzziness(Object fuzziness)
      Sets the minimum similarity used when evaluated to a fuzzy query type.
      MatchQueryBuilder MatchQueryBuilder.fuzzyRewrite(String fuzzyRewrite) 
      static MatchQueryBuilder QueryBuilders.matchPhrasePrefixQuery(String name, Object text)
      Creates a match query with type "PHRASE_PREFIX" for the provided field name and text.
      static MatchQueryBuilder QueryBuilders.matchPhraseQuery(String name, Object text)
      Creates a text query with type "PHRASE" for the provided field name and text.
      static MatchQueryBuilder QueryBuilders.matchQuery(String name, Object text)
      Creates a match query with type "BOOLEAN" for the provided field name and text.
      MatchQueryBuilder MatchQueryBuilder.maxExpansions(int maxExpansions)
      When using fuzzy or prefix type query, the number of term expansions to use.
      MatchQueryBuilder MatchQueryBuilder.minimumShouldMatch(String minimumShouldMatch) 
      MatchQueryBuilder MatchQueryBuilder.operator(MatchQueryBuilder.Operator operator)
      Sets the operator to use when using a boolean query.
      MatchQueryBuilder MatchQueryBuilder.prefixLength(int prefixLength) 
      MatchQueryBuilder MatchQueryBuilder.rewrite(String rewrite) 
      MatchQueryBuilder MatchQueryBuilder.setLenient(boolean lenient)
      Sets whether format based failures will be ignored.
      MatchQueryBuilder MatchQueryBuilder.slop(int slop)
      Set the phrase slop if evaluated to a phrase query type.
      static MatchQueryBuilder QueryBuilders.text(String name, Object text)
      Deprecated. 
      use QueryBuilders.textQuery(String, Object) instead
      static MatchQueryBuilder QueryBuilders.textPhrase(String name, Object text)
      Deprecated. 
      use QueryBuilders.textPhraseQuery(String, Object) instead
      static MatchQueryBuilder QueryBuilders.textPhrasePrefix(String name, Object text)
      Deprecated. 
      use QueryBuilders.textPhrasePrefixQuery(String, Object) instead
      static MatchQueryBuilder QueryBuilders.textPhrasePrefixQuery(String name, Object text)
      Deprecated. 
      Use QueryBuilders.matchPhrasePrefixQuery(String, Object)
      static MatchQueryBuilder QueryBuilders.textPhraseQuery(String name, Object text)
      Deprecated. 
      Use QueryBuilders.matchPhraseQuery(String, Object)
      static MatchQueryBuilder QueryBuilders.textQuery(String name, Object text)
      Deprecated. 
      Use QueryBuilders.matchQuery(String, Object)
      MatchQueryBuilder MatchQueryBuilder.type(MatchQueryBuilder.Type type)
      Sets the type of the text query.
